Blender/2024-11-14---Drakon's-Birthday-2.content:
Notes
Another year, another birthday render. This time, it‚Äôs Iriali and Marina celebrating Vallia‚Äôs birthday. They‚Äôre cuddled up with her on the couch in their living room, surrounded by delightful birthday props and an overly meta meme spread scattered across the table and cushions.

Blender/2025-03-01---FFXIV-2025-Wedding-.title: 2025-03-01 - FFXIV 2025 Wedding Anniversary - Notes
Blender/2025-03-01---FFXIV-2025-Wedding-.content:
Notes
Sixth annual wedding anniversary render featuring Iriali and Vallia. Their in character marriage (Initially July 2019, ) coincides with the actual date of our (Tiggs and I) wedding anniversary. Each year I try to make a new unique render featuring them celebrating together in with a wholesome depiction of their shared love and growth together.

Blender/Blender.title: Blender
Blender/Blender.content:
Blender
Blender is a powerful, free, and open-source 3D creation suite used by artists, animators, game developers, and filmmakers around the world. It supports the entire 3D pipeline‚Äîfrom modeling and sculpting to animation, rendering, compositing, and even video editing. With its robust toolset, customizable interface, and active community, Blender has become a go-to platform for both indie creators and professional studios. Whether you‚Äôre crafting cinematic worlds or prototyping game assets, Blender gives you the freedom to create without limits.
www.blender.org/
